评论概述: Cute earrings but design needs tweaking so it doesn't spin in your ear.
评论详情: Should solder the post to the top, not the center of the earring. The earring sits too high on the ear and spins because the post is in the middle and causes an imbalance. If the post were soldered at the top, it would be bottom heavy and not spin as much.
